main event: A white glowing object was observed hopping in the sky and climbing rapidly over Crowley, Texas on September 21, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described to have a white glow, The sighting lasted only 10 seconds, The object initially had a level flight before climbing rapidly, The observer noted that the object's behavior did not correlate with any known aircraft in the area, The observer was a Convair service engineer and an Air Force reservist.
witness description: Convair service engineer and Air Force reservist
